<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711P B12C4D1 A PanelView Plus 1250 Keypad Touch ENET RS232 | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-B12C4D1 PanelView Plus 1250 Color Terminal 12.1 inch, Keypad and Touch Screen, Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 64 MB Flash, 64 MB RAM, DC power, Series A
miscellaneous: The Allen Bradley 2711P-B12C4D1 PanelView Plus terminals use additional modular components allowing for flexible configuration, installation, and upgrades. The field replaceable 12.1-inch flat-panel color displays come with keypad, analog touch screen, or keypad/touch screen input. To meet more stringent environmental conditions, high-bright, conformal-coated, and marine certified display modules are also available.
specifications: Display Description: Color Active Matrix TFT; Display Size: 12.1 inch; Resolution: 800 x 600 18-bit Color Graphics; Touch Screen Description: Analog resistive; Communication Ports: Ethernet, RS-232, 2 USB; Input Voltage: 18-32V DC (24V DC nominal).
